title: Censused shall mean those slums located on lands belonging to Govt
clause_text: Censused shall mean those slums located on lands belonging to Govt., any undertaking of Govt., or MCGM and incorporated in the records of the land-owning authority as having been censused in 1976, 1980, or 1985 or prior to 1st January, 1995, and 1st Jan 2000
section: Definition of Slum, Pavement, and Structure of hut:

source_pdf.text_snippet: Censused shall mean those slums located on lands belonging to Govt., any undertaking of Govt., or MCGM and incorporated in the records of the land-owning authority as having been censused in 1976, 198
